divs: Sighting Details1 i was sitting outside talking with my friends 2 a low buzing noise and my friend pointed it out 3 a ufo becuse my friends saw one and i guess it flew over them or somthing 4 it was orbs they came together and formed a v they continued to fly at speeds that were faster than a jet made sharp turnes and a yoyo up and down and flew east and left 5 amazed we fillmed it but i dont have a copy to give u ;( 6 it flew east
